item.description:
Come join in the fun and play some ultimate frisbee! All skill levels are welcome! Don't worry if you have never played, we can teach you.  Competition is friendly and fun! Bring your friends! 

 

Make sure you wear clothes and shoes good for running because this is definitely a work out! Don't forget to bring a drink!

 

My number is 703-314-3380 in case you can't find us.

 

New earlier time!  Hopefully this will encourage more people to come so that it doesn't take out a chunk of the middle of the day!
item.how_to_find_us: In the back on the football field (hopefully). We play on the adjacent soccer/baseball field if the football field is occupied. Parking in the school parking lot rather than the street by the playground is recommended
item.name: Frisbee Fun!
